text: @perlmutations That's not happening, @perlmutations. Remember that he had them sign disclaimers not to sue him and/or his campaign organizers/entities, if they contracted Bad Dude COVID-19 during his rally. Herman Cain (and others in that context) committed global-trending, dumbass suicide.
